apps.name: SideStore
apps.versionDescription:
Happy March! We have been busy with doing quality of life changes and getting stuff up and running like deactivating and getting bugs fixed that you guys found in nightly. We don’t currently have a fix for expiring early issue but is in the works like anisette issues. This should allow basic support for all functions.

 For people that want to use MDC no3applimit (MacDirtyCow). It’s currently not ready as it includes the patch not needing any external apps. So for any brave people that really want if you will have to look at this pull request and use the ipa downloads from GitHub actions  https://github.com/SideStore/SideStore/pull/259 . We don’t recommend relying on pull requests as because a commit could break the app so be warned, this is the same for nightly but with nightly has latest develop branch changes.

 What's Changed: 

 - Fix beta apps not refreshing 

 - Fix beta apps on the my apps view 

 - Fix deactivating/activating apps 

 - Merge all of Riley's new error handling stuff 

 - add easy anisette server selector iOS Settings app 

 - added toggle for custom anisette server 

 - Change the default anisette server 

 - Add a bit more logging throughout the signing process to help us pin down issues 

 - Allow for .mobiledevicepairing and .plist files to be selected, try and pin down why users can't select either 

 - Hopefully fix AltWidget issues 

 - Add analytics to help developers understand current demographic of users (and hopefully pin down version specific bugs) 

 - Icon change (thanks LittRitt!) 

 - Sidestore directory accessible in files 

 - Reset pairing file button 

 - Advanced settings button 

 - Browse icon change 

 - Credit adjustment 

 - Background color fixes 

 - Added more permission types for sources 

 - Join Patreon button crash fix 

 - Turned off background notification refreshes 

 - Sidestore Logger 

 - Minimuxer logger 

 - Additional logging for minimuxer for sidestore for troubleshooting 

 - Replace Placeholder video for pairing instructions. 

 - Fix BundleId issues on parts of sidestore 

 - Fix trusted sources if one app has problems that it shouldn’t take down the full list. 

 

 Full Commit Changelog: https://github.com/SideStore/SideStore/compare/0.1.1...0.3.1

versions.localizedDescription:
Happy March! We have been busy with doing quality of life changes and getting stuff up and running like deactivating and getting bugs fixed that you guys found in nightly. We don’t currently have a fix for expiring early issue but is in the works like anisette issues. This should allow basic support for all functions.

 For people that want to use MDC no3applimit (MacDirtyCow). It’s currently not ready as it includes the patch not needing any external apps. So for any brave people that really want if you will have to look at this pull request and use the ipa downloads from GitHub actions  https://github.com/SideStore/SideStore/pull/259 . We don’t recommend relying on pull requests as because a commit could break the app so be warned, this is the same for nightly but with nightly has latest develop branch changes.

 What's Changed: 

 - Fix beta apps not refreshing 

 - Fix beta apps on the my apps view 

 - Fix deactivating/activating apps 

 - Merge all of Riley's new error handling stuff 

 - add easy anisette server selector iOS Settings app 

 - added toggle for custom anisette server 

 - Change the default anisette server 

 - Add a bit more logging throughout the signing process to help us pin down issues 

 - Allow for .mobiledevicepairing and .plist files to be selected, try and pin down why users can't select either 

 - Hopefully fix AltWidget issues 

 - Add analytics to help developers understand current demographic of users (and hopefully pin down version specific bugs) 

 - Icon change (thanks LittRitt!) 

 - Sidestore directory accessible in files 

 - Reset pairing file button 

 - Advanced settings button 

 - Browse icon change 

 - Credit adjustment 

 - Background color fixes 

 - Added more permission types for sources 

 - Join Patreon button crash fix 

 - Turned off background notification refreshes 

 - Sidestore Logger 

 - Minimuxer logger 

 - Additional logging for minimuxer for sidestore for troubleshooting 

 - Replace Placeholder video for pairing instructions. 

 - Fix BundleId issues on parts of sidestore 

 - Fix trusted sources if one app has problems that it shouldn’t take down the full list. 

 

 Full Commit Changelog: https://github.com/SideStore/SideStore/compare/0.1.1...0.3.1

Welcome to the next generation of sideloading! This update fixes and adds the following:

 - Officially adds ability to pair via a mobiledevicepairing and a plist file.

 - Changes patreon page. fixes GroupID staging issues.

 - Fixes refreshing SideStore creating a second app or fails refreshing.

apps.localizedDescription:
SideStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

SideStore allows you to sideload other .ipa files and apps from the Files app or via the SideStore Library

permissions.usageDescription: SideStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows SideStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

news.title: #StandWithUkraine
news.caption: Find out how you can help support those impacted by the Russian invasion.

news.title: Welcome to SideStore!
news.caption: Check out the Wiki page for more info

news.title: Proceed with Caution!
news.caption: SideStore is currently pre-release software. Expect bugs, and please report them
